channel.title: Blythe|Riverside County|California|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Blythe|Riverside County|California|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: Neighbors Blvd. South at I-10
item.description: Neighbors Blvd. south at I-10. BL-10 ends here and CA-78 begins.

item.title: End I-10 Business at I-10 and CA-78
item.description: Western end of I-10 Blythe business loop at I-10 on Neighbors Blvd. Neighbors Blvd. continues south as CA-78.

item.title: I-10 West Exit 236 Offramp at CA-78
item.description: I-10 west Exit 236 offramp at CA-78. CA-78 heads southwest to the Imperial Valley and eventually Oceanside. This is also the western end of the Blythe I-10 Business Loop.

item.title: I-10 West Exit 236 Offramp at CA-78
item.description: I-10 west at Exit 236 at CA-78 to Palo Verde and Ripley.

item.title: I-10 West Approaching Exit 241
item.description: I-10 west approaching Exit 241 - US-95/Intake Blvd/Needles. US-95 north leaves I-10 here. US-95 south joins I-10 east to Quartzsite, AZ.

item.title: I-10 West - Welcome To California
item.description: Welcome to California on I-10 West/US-95 north, just west of the California State Agricultural Inspection Station. Entering Pacific Time Zone.

item.title: I-10 West - Exit 243
item.description: I-10 west at Exit 243 - Riviera Drive. Taken upon leaving the California State Agricultural Inspection Station.

item.title: I-10 West - California State Line
item.description: California State Line on I-10 west crossing the Colorado River, at the Arizona-California Border.

item.title: I-10 East - Arizona Exit 1
item.description: I-10 East approaching Arizona Exit 1 - Ehrenberg/Parker. Taken before the Colorado River bridge. The sign appears to be placed by Arizona DOT.

item.title: I-10 East - Exit 243
item.description: I-10 east at Exit 243 - Riviera Drive. This is the last exit in California on I-10.

item.title: I-10 East - Exit 241
item.description: I-10 east at Exit 241 - US-95/Intake Blvd./Needles. US-95 joins I-10 east to Quartzite, Arizona.

item.title: I-10 East - Exit 239
item.description: I-10 east at Exit 239 - Lovekin Blvd./Blythe
